title: Tamil & English Keyboard
description: Tamil & English Keyboard is an Android app. Primary keypad is Tamil and english keypad as a secondary option in the same keyboard.

title: Single Page TableGrid
description: Single page table grid with backend data. All are configrable such as edit, delete, view only, report, search, shuffle and refresh. And dynamic validation for email, username, number and etc.
env: JavaScript, AJAX, HTML, CSS, jQuery, PHP, MYSQL
